name: Muhammad Yousuf
tagline: Publication of the Holy Quran (Elimination of Printing Errors) Rules, 1973
content:
REGISTERED No. S. 1033 
I Valliant  
EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
KARACHI, SUNDAY, JUNE 22, 1986 
PART II 
Statutory Notifications containing Rules and Orders issued by all Ministries 
and Divisions of the Government of Pakistan and their Attached and 
Subordinate Offices and the Supreme Court of Pakistan 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKISTAN 
MINISTRY OF RELIGIOUS AFFAIRS AND MINORITIES AFFAIRS 
NOTIFICATION 
Islamabad, the 15th June, 1986 
S. R. 0. 24 (KE)186 : 
In exercise of the powers conferred by section 8 of the Publication of the 
Holy Quran (Elimination of Printing Errors) Act, 1973 (LIV of 1973), the 
Federal Government is pleased to direct that the following further amendment 
shall be made in the publication of the Holy Quran (Elimination of Printing 
Errors) Rules, 1973, namely :— 
In the aforesaid Rules, in rule 4, in sub-rule (1) after the word " Side " 
at the end, the words, comma and figure "and if newsprint is used, 
it should not be of less than 52 grammage " shall be added. 
[No. 2(8)186-DDQJ 
MUHAMMAD YOUSUF, 
Secretary. 
( 73 ) 
PRINTED BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, KARACFII 
PUBLISHED BY THE MANAGER OF PUBLICATIONS, KARACHI :1986  
Price: Ps. 20
